articles.content: Shields said she had long dreamed of becoming a two-sport champion and has envied how well M.M.A. has marketed female fighters. She likes that M.M.A. often puts women on cards with men and tells more… [+1883 chars]

articles.author: Bob Holliday, Jodi Leese Glusco
articles.title: Holliday: Triangle teams finish unusual regular season with (slim) hopes for more in March - WRALSportsFan.com
articles.description: The 2021 ACC regular season, surreal though it has seemed at times, wraps up this week with the conference having played 81% of scheduled games, against some pretty tall odds.
articles.content:
By Bob Holliday, WRAL Sports contributor
The Atlantic Coast Conference launched this campaign back in November amid ever-increasing community spread of COVID-19. Coronavirus cases soared in December… [+14666 chars]
